description:
Tommy has a new buddy to play with; he's Billy The Kid, a 28 year old male dancer from New York.Tommy had this guy fly in for a birthday present to himself. The two used to work together in a Toronto strip club a couple summers ago.

Things get started with an interview, then move on to a strip show for Tommy. Once Billy gets naked, Tommy takes charge and gives his friend a blowjob. That changes into a 69 before Billy dances so erotically that Tommy can't stand it and cums all over himself.

Enjoy!
title: Dance Of Billy The Kid
